Class ShoppingBag

  • java.lang.Object
    • ShoppingBag
  • public class ShoppingBag
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the container class that defines the abstract data type for a shopping bag and its operations.
    Author:
    Kaivalya Mishra, Ridwanur Sarder

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private GroceryItem[] bag
      Array of grocery items.
      private int size
      Number of items in bag.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ShoppingBag()
      Constructor to initialize a ShoppingBag with a bag of length 5 and size 0.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void add​(GroceryItem item)
      Adds a GroceryItem object (item) to the bag.
      private int find​(GroceryItem item)
      Finds a GroceryItem object (item) within the bag and returns its index.
      int getSize()
      Returns the size value (number of items within the bag) of the respective ShoppingBag object.
      private void grow()
      Increases the capacity of the bag by 5.
      boolean isEmpty()
      Checks to see if the bag is empty.
      static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
      Testbed main for the ShoppingBag class.
      void print()
      Prints out the name, price, and taxable values of each GroceryItem object in the bag.
      boolean remove​(GroceryItem item)
      Removes the first instance of a GroceryItem object (item) from the bag.
      double salesPrice()
      Takes the sum of all the GroceryItem objects' price values within the bag.
      double salesTax()
      Takes the sum of all the GroceryItem objects' price values multiplied by the constant 0.06625 within the bag.
      private void testHelper()
      Method that tests for salesPrice(), salesTax(), print(), getSize(), and isEmpty().

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • bag

        private GroceryItem[] bag
        Array of grocery items.

      • size

        private int size
        Number of items in bag.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ShoppingBag

        public ShoppingBag()
        Constructor to initialize a ShoppingBag with a bag of length 5 and size 0.

    • Method Detail

      • find

        private int find​(GroceryItem item)
        Finds a GroceryItem object (item) within the bag and returns its index.
        Parameters:
        item - GroceryItem object
        Returns:
        Returns index of item or -1 if item is not found

      • grow

        private void grow()
        Increases the capacity of the bag by 5.

      • add

        public void add​(GroceryItem item)
        Adds a GroceryItem object (item) to the bag. Utilizes grow() if bag is full and then adds.
        Parameters:
        item - GroceryItem object

      • remove

        public boolean remove​(GroceryItem item)
        Removes the first instance of a GroceryItem object (item) from the bag. Utilizes find() to locate item.
        Parameters:
        item - GroceryItem object
        Returns:
        Returns true if item is removed and false if otherwise

      • salesPrice

        public double salesPrice()
        Takes the sum of all the GroceryItem objects' price values within the bag.
        Returns:
        Returns sum price of bag GroceryItem objects as a double

      • salesTax

        public double salesTax()
        Takes the sum of all the GroceryItem objects' price values multiplied by the constant 0.06625 within the bag.
        Returns:
        Returns sum price of bag GroceryItem objects multiplied by 0.06625 as a double

      • print

        public void print()
        Prints out the name, price, and taxable values of each GroceryItem object in the bag.

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Checks to see if the bag is empty.
        Returns:
        Returns true if empty and false otherwise

      • getSize

        public int getSize()
        Returns the size value (number of items within the bag) of the respective ShoppingBag object.
        Returns:
        Number of items within the bag

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
        Testbed main for the ShoppingBag class.
        Parameters:
        args -

      • testHelper

        private void testHelper()
        Method that tests for salesPrice(), salesTax(), print(), getSize(), and isEmpty().
